subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Yu Darvish, the star pitcher from Japan, could be coming to the major leagues, if he and an M.L.B. team are willing to wade through the frequently tricky posting process.
snippet: Yu Darvish, the star pitcher from Japan, could be coming to the major leagues, if he and an M.L.B. team are willing to wade through the frequently tricky posting process.
